name: Accused
description:
Made for Mağara Jam #5 in 72 hours

by Deniz Öndin & Umut Kılıç

Packages Used

Human models and animations => Mixamo

Car model => https://free3d.com

Interior scene => ArchVizPRO Interior Vol.6 (Unity Asset Store)

Fighting Particles=>Cartoon FX Remaster (Unity Asset Store)

All Scene Music=>Colossal Game Music Collection (Unity Asset Store)

Fighting sounds =>Footstep and Foley Sounds (Unity Asset Store)

Footsteps&sounds =>Invector Footstep System (Unity Asset Store)

Japanese Scene =>Japanese Alley (Unity Asset Store)

Loading Scenes=>Loading Screen Studio (Unity Asset Store)
